medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's condition had slowly declined since December 2015, including a weight loss of >13 kg and worsening memory. Three days before admission, he stopped oral intake and began experiencing chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asplenia, diabetes mellitus, coronary artery disease, mitral valve replacement, implantable defibrillator, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, hypertension, gastrointestinal bleeding, chronic iron-deficient anemia requiring intravenous iron infusions and packed red blood cell transfusions.
medical_history.social_history: The patient relocated from Pennsylvania to Northwest Arkansas in November 2015. He had helped clear brush in November and December 2015 but hired someone to pull shrubs in the spring months before admission. His wife mowed the lawn as he was not well enough for outdoor activities.
